attributes.action: Allowing Vets to use Green Lights when attending an Emergency Call Out
attributes.additional_details:
Vets should be allowed to use Green flashing lights, coupled with signage such as Vet on Call (Similar to GPs) when attending animal Emergencies.

It should only be used to highlight that the vet is on an emergency, life threatening call, it would not allow them to break speeding laws, but it may help to show that they are on an emergency call and save an animals life.

I would hope that this would help them to attend an incident in good time without major delays.
